definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="enchant_lvl">enchant_lvl</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_attacked</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:enchant_lvl</field><value name="VAL"><block type="item_get_enhancement"><field name="enhancement">CUSTOM:LightningBlade</field><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GTE</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:enchant_lvl</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="deal_damage"><field name="damagesource">GENERIC</field><value name="amount"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:enchant_lvl</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">20</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem" x="-157" y="397"></block><block type="entity_from_deps" x="-173" y="524"></block></xml>
